name: Piper's Swarm
description:
Command an army of rats through the enchanting power of song, devastate crops and flee felines!

Made in 48 Hours for GMTK Game Jam 2021 and inspired by the tale of the pied piper

!!!BUG!!! - DO NOT touch the volume controls

- CREDITS -

Art by Shepherd - @MushiShepherd (Twitter/Instagram)

Programming and additional art by KassieKitsune and Greedy Eve - @LanFanHasA (Twitter)

Music and Sounds by Olivia Renee Soules - @Olipolygon(Twitter)- Bandcamp

Voice acting by Frank -

❄ Sorry for the lack of a web build, I managed to mess up the HTML5 export after fixing a bug and didn't notice. My Bad!

Speaking of bugs, Here's more!

- Volume controls tied to movement, oops!

- A rat can simultaneously occupy multiple holes!

- Tilemap stuff, there's an invulnerable corn

Post-Jam to do list :

- Fix those bugs

- Game endstate and restart button

- Respawning rats
